nodes.text: Ubrikkian Industries was a vehicle manufacturing company in the galaxy. Its products included the Imperial Troop Transport, the Bantha-II cargo skiff, a sail barge notably used by Jabba the Hutt, and the Ubrikkian Floating Fortress, a hover-platform.
Ubrikkian operated a factory in Coronet City, Corellia; however this facility was Imperialized and taken over by the Galactic Empire, leading to the layoff of its employees like HarrGick.
